content: TE-H SP Clay spade chisels Extra-sharp clay spade chisel bit for digging and loosening terrain using the third-gen TE 3000 or H28 demolition tools with clamp ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Specially designed, high-performance rounded clay spade – sharpened edge for faster penetration of clay, hard-packed gravel and dirt Upgraded earth piercing power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the spade Better reliability – these spade bits are made from high-alloy steel, essential when you need consistency and reliability Built for tough jobs – tested for extreme use, our clay spades are made to power through your most demanding earthworks and ground preparation tasks Certified quality – developed using ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Applications Digging into clay, hard-packed gravel or dirt For use with third-generation TE 3000 electric jackhammers and H28 demolition tools with clamp ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-H (Hilti HEX 28) Application: Earth work Length: 19.7 in Technical Data | Connection end | TE-H (Hilti HEX 28) | Application | Earth work | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2429006 - Clay spade chisel TE-H SP 50 - Package Size 1 pc - 2254759 - Clay spade TE-HX SP 50 - Package Size 1 pc
